Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory297.png'}
{3: 'The disc-shaped elevator descends slowly, finally bringing the you all to a larger disc.'}
{3: 'After the four of you jump onto the disc, the elevator descends straight down to the desert below.'}
{3: '—But is it really a desert?'}
{3: 'At such a height, none of you are able to discern its surface—whether it is covered with fine sand or coarse gravel.'}
{3: 'But if you could magnify the image with an optical device, you would find that the dunes are made of crumbled buildings and debris.'}
{3: 'Moreover, the constant collision and friction between the concrete blocks have broken them down into smaller fragments.'}
{3: 'Once the fragments are fine enough, they seem to disappear altogether—as if sinking to the depths below.'}
{3: 'There are also several towering buildings among the "sand," seemingly having survived the collapse without being completely broken down.'}
{3: 'That being said, the constant erosion continues to take its toll on the buildings. With enough time, they, too, will disintegrate into "sand."'}
{3: 'Regardless, Embla—or what appears to be Embla—kneels before a massive figure on the giant disc.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'You are the one who wants to awaken "Father"?'}
{2: '???', 3: '...Your speech pattern has deviated from your defaults.'}
{2: 'Embla?', 3: '...I. Have been in contact. With outside beings.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Outside beings... I see.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'You are a "defect."'}
{2: '???', 3: 'You are not a champion of the "war," nor are you the defeated.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'You will be destroyed to uphold the rules of purity for the "war."'}
{2: 'Embla?', 3: 'I. Will be... Destroyed?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The massive figure speaks as it raises the polearm in its hand—'}
{3: 'Although slightly hesitant about your orders, Lucia immediately rushes forward—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "—And she smashes the weapon out of the figure's hand, sending it flying off to the side."}
{3: 'As Lucia attacks, Liv and Lee work together to drag the kneeling Embla off to the side.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'What are you?'}
{2: 'Stop taking the words out of my mouth.', 3: '38'}
{2: '???', 3: '"Father" bequeathed me the name "Machiavelli".'}
{2: 'Machiavelli', 3: '"Father" bestowed me with power as the "Final Arbiter".'}
{2: 'Machiavelli', 3: '—I stand guard here for generations awaiting the "war" to produce a champion.'}
{2: 'Machiavelli', 3: '—With my own hands, I will awaken the half of "Father" most suitable for this land.'}
{2: 'Machiavelli', 3: 'Therefore, all "defects" are not permitted to enter "the Strip of Truth". Only the champion... may enter.'}
{2: 'Sorry, that is not for you to decide.', 3: '44', 4: "Embla isn't a defect.", 5: '45'}
{2: 'Machiavelli', 3: 'You have no right to decide, even if there is a Sapien among you.'}
{2: 'Machiavelli', 3: 'Judgment of said "defects" is not determined by uncertified "Sapiens" such as yourself.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Looks like it's refusing to talk this out.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Machiavelli', 3: 'I do not need to talk with the likes of you.'}
{2: 'Machiavelli', 3: '"War" must continue. Your flesh and blood will be used to build a new "battlefield."'}
{2: 'Is this city the "battlefield"?', 3: '52'}
{2: 'Machiavelli', 3: 'Indeed. Then a new "war" will begin anew.'}
{2: 'What about the "defects"?', 3: '54'}
{2: 'Machiavelli', 3: 'Beings that do not participate in the "war" do not have the right to live.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Well, I guess there's no point in wasting our breath.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "If we don't stop it here, Embla will be destroyed and become a part of the city...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Machiavelli', 3: 'Indeed. The rules of Father warrant no exception.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Commandant, we'll count on your commands.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Understood.', 3: '62'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Defeating Machiavelli is the only way Embla... and we will survive.', 4: '1'}
